definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Da 11:18 chief, ruler (prop. decider, cf. Dr:Da 11:8);—abs. ´[[ק]]: Ju Jdg 11:6 + ; cstr. [[קְצִּין]] Is 3:7; pl. cstr. [[קְעִינֵי]] Is 1:40 + ; sf. [[קְחִינַיִח]] Is 22:3;—
chief, commander in war Jos 10:24 (JE), Ju Jdg 11:6, Jdg 11:11 (‖[[ראׁשׁ ]]), Da 11:18.
more gen., ruler, man in authority, Is 1:10, Is 22:3, Mic 3:1, Mic 3:9; of ants, ´[[אֵין ק]]: Pr 6:7 (+[[שׁׂטֵר]], [[משֵׁל]]).—Pr 25:15 read probably [[קֶחֶף]] (Toy).
